```{r, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggvis)

(rd <- read_csv("rd.csv", col_types = cols(Person = col_skip())))
```

```{r, echo=TRUE}
rd %>% 
  ggvis(~x, ~y) %>% 
  layer_points() %>% 
  group_by(z) %>% 
  layer_model_predictions(model = "lm", formula = y ~ x)
```
